ValidationRule.description: If Resume is selected in Override field then Support status can only be “In Process”, “Resource Assigned”, Resource Requested”
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Support_Request_Override_Status__c , 'Resume'), NOT( OR(ISPICKVAL(Support_Status__c , 'In Process'),ISPICKVAL(Support_Status__c , 'Resource Assigned'),ISPICKVAL(Support_Status__c , 'Resource Requested'),ISPICKVAL(Support_Status__c , 'Placed On Hold'),ISPICKVAL(Support_Status__c , 'Deprioritized')) ) ,RecordTypeId = '012A0000000Vhcv')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to select "Resume", Support Status must be “In Process”, “Resource Assigned”, "Resource Requested”, “Placed on Hold” or “Deprioritized”.
